Pre-Game Insights: Dallas Mavericks are on a five-game losing streak.
The Mavericks are 14-13 against Western Conference opponents.
The Lakers are 16-8 against conference opponents.
The Mavericks average 116.4 points per game, 2.5 more points than the 113.9 the Lakers give up.
The Lakers average 11.9 made 3-pointers per game this season, 1.0 fewer made shot on average than the 12.9 per game the Mavericks give up.
Kyrie Irving is averaging 24.3 points and 4.9 assists for the Mavericks.
Anthony Davis is averaging 26 points, 11.8 rebounds, 3.5 assists and 2.2 blocks for the Lakers.
Injuries for Mavericks: Dante Exum (wrist), Luka Doncic (calf), Kyrie Irving (illness).

Injuries for Lakers: Anthony Davis (foot), Cam Reddish (back), LeBron James (injury management), Jarred Vanderbilt (knee), Gabe Vincent (oblique), Christian Wood (knee), Jalen Hood-Schifino (hamstring).
